page.title: 17North Bransholme.
page.content:
North Bransholme was a very nice place about nine years ago. It was very quiet, but now there are gangs going around every night and I don't think that it is safe to go out.
The shops used to be very neat and tidy but now there is litter everywhere. The 'Scout Patrol' (a Hull based security firm) have to lock up and put alarms on everywhere.
There is a community centre but it only seems to run Bingo for the old aged pensioners.
I go to the Rugby club for training and also to the club for ten to thirteen year olds on Mondays. There is also a club for older children on Fridays.
